blogPost.excerpt: Easily removes distracting settings and features from apps ✨ Turn off auto-play videos ✨ Hide news feeds ✨ Unsubscribe from notifications ✨ Hide recommendations ✨ Supports YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more
blogPost.body: Easily removes distracting settings and features from apps ✨ Turn off auto-play videos ✨ Hide news feeds ✨ Unsubscribe from notifications ✨ Hide recommendations ✨ Supports YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more
blogPost.title: Channel - Removes distracting features from apps
blogPost.author: Tom Calabrese

localize.description: 轻松去除应用中分散注意力的设置和功能 ✨ 关闭自动播放视频 ✨ 隐藏新闻源 ✨ 取消订阅通知 ✨ 隐藏推荐 ✨ 支持YouTube、Facebook、Instagram、Twitter等。
localize.tagline: 移除应用程序中分散注意力的功能

localize.description: 輕鬆去除應用中分散注意力的設置和功能 ✨ 關閉自動播放視頻 ✨ 隱藏新聞源 ✨ 取消訂閱通知 ✨ 隱藏推薦 ✨ 支持YouTube、Facebook、Instagram、Twitter等。
localize.tagline: 移除應用程序中分散注意力的功能

previous.excerpt: This free tool determines if your website follows the 7 key factors and if its complaint with Google's Core Web Vitals. Knowing where your website stands will help you prepare for the upcoming Google Page Experience Update in May!
previous.title: Page Experience Checker by Cloudways - Test 7 factors of website compliance with core web vitals

localize.description: 这个免费的工具可以确定你的网站是否遵循了7个关键因素，以及是否对谷歌的核心网站生命体征进行了投诉。了解您的网站所处的位置将帮助您为即将到来的谷歌页面体验更新做好准备。
localize.tagline: 测试网站符合核心网络生命体征的7个因素

localize.description: 這個免費的工具可以確定你的網站是否遵循了7個關鍵因素，以及是否對谷歌的核心網站生命體徵進行了投訴。瞭解您的網站所處的位置將幫助您爲即將到來的谷歌頁面體驗更新做好準備。
localize.tagline: 測試網站符合核心網絡生命體徵的7個因素

next.excerpt: WOMBO is the world’s best AI-powered lip sync app 👨‍🎤👩‍🎤 All you have to do is add a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. The result? Videos that are hilarious, bizarre, fun, and ready to go viral. No singing lessons required.
next.title: WOMBO - Make your selfies sing

localize.description: WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驱动的唇语同步应用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一张自拍照，选择一首歌曲，让WOMBO发挥它的魔力。结果呢？幽默、怪异、有趣的视频，随时可以传播。不需要任何歌唱课程。
WOMBO是世界上最好的人工智能驅動的脣語同步應用👨🎤Դ🎤，你要做的就是添加一張自拍照，選擇一首歌曲，讓WOMBO發揮它的魔力。結果呢？幽默、怪異、有趣的視頻，隨時可以傳播。不需要任何歌唱課程。
